newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech CNB fixes crown +5.00 pct vs mark/usd basket.
newsitem.headline: Czech CNB fixes crown +5.00 pct vs mark/usd basket.

text.p: The Czech National Bank (CNB) on Friday fixed the crown at 27.274 to the dollar after Thursday's fixing at 27.354 and at 17.009 to the mark from 17.218.
The above rates imply a deviation from the midpoint of the central bank's mark/dollar basket of +5.00 percent, after a deviation of +4.14 percent on Thursday.
During the minute at which the central bank calculated today's fixing, the crown was trading on the interbank market at +4.97 percent.
The crown fixing is announced daily at about 1140 CET (1040 GMT), and is within plus/minus 7.5 percent of the mark/dollar basket midpoint calculated between 11:30:00 and 11:30:59 CET.
